name: Kainos
tagline: We’re changing the way the world lives and works
description: Kainos Group plc is a high growth, UK-based provider of IT services, consulting and software solutions. The Group specialises in the development of digital technology solutions; software design and agile software development; third-party software integration and implementation services; automated testing services; technology support services; and related ancillary services such as project management, all provided across multiple sectors.
